cosmos.question: I am bright and hot, and give Earth light all day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I appear during the day
🔥 I am a giant ball of fire
😎 Without me, it would be very dark

cosmos.question: I spin around the Earth and shine at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I have phases like crescent and full
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese
🌎 I am Earth's natural satellite

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that shines far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky
🔭 I am much further than the moon
🌌 I'm like our sun, but way more distant

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: Ursa Major is one
✨ Connect the dots to see me
🏹 Some are named after animals or heroes

cosmos.question: I am the planet you live on. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I am your home
💧 I am mostly covered in water
🌍 I am third from the sun

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I am smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Sometimes I have a tail
🌠 I can create a shooting star
💥 I sometimes crash into planets

cosmos.question: I am a group of billions of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am like a giant island in space
✨ Our sun is a tiny part of me
💫 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular

cosmos.question: I am a hot, glowing ball of gas that is the center of a solar system. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I hold planets in orbit around me
🔥 I am a giant nuclear reactor
⭐ Other stars might have planets around them too

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps planets in orbit around the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am what makes things fall down
🧲 I am a pulling force
⚖️ The bigger you are, the stronger I am

cosmos.question: I am a region of space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am invisible
🌀 I suck everything around me
💫 I am what happens when a star dies

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I love to swim in a puddle. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow when I'm young.
🌾 I like to eat seeds and bread.
💧 I have webbed feet to help me swim.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up my food.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when you pet me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 I have whiskers and soft fur.

animal.question: I have a mane and I roar. I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a very powerful animal.
🍖 I am a meat eater.
☀️ I live in Africa.
hints.label: ☀️ I live in the savanna.

animal.question: I hop around and I love carrots. I have long ears and a fluffy tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat vegetables.
🐾 Some people keep me as a pet.
🍄 I am known for my hopping.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse, but different. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🌿 I eat grass.
🎨 My stripes help me camouflage.

animal.question: I live in the sea and have eight arms. I can squeeze into tiny places. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I don't have bones.
💦 I squirt ink when scared.
🌊 I am very intelligent.

animal.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I like to eat lettuce. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🥬 I am a herbivore.
🏡 I can hide inside my shell.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a powerful tail and sharp teeth. I live in rivers and swamps. What am I?

hints.text: 🐊 I am a predator.
☀️ I like warm places.
🦷 I am a relative of the dinosaur.

animal.question: I'm a nocturnal bird with excellent hearing and eyesight. I hoot as I fly silently through the night. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I hunt at night.
🐭 I often eat small rodents.
🌲 I live in forests.
